name: Aegir Rising
description:
You wake up a living cliche: you have no idea where  you are or how you got here. Luckily for you, you're not alone.

Made in one week for the Dungeon Crawler Jam 2022, the game is very short and still has a few bugs. After the judging period, I'll post an updated version, in the meantime, be gentle to the airlock doors, they're trying their hardest.

In the unlikely event that you can't move during combat, keep shooting: an enemy has gotten too close to you sharing the same space as you. Teach 'em some manners.

Controls

Right and left handed controls!

WASD to move and QE to turn (or numpad 789456)

C or numpad 0 to look down

Left mouse button to interact/shoot

Right mouse button to examine stuff

Your Taser has a short range (3 squares) so be careful!
